author: StuffTV
title: The best Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge and S7 deals - February 2017
text:
O2's best Galaxy S7 Edge offering comes in at £36.50 a month. Galaxy S7 Edge 32GB 3GB of 4G UK data Unlimited minutes Unlimited texts 
TOTAL COST OF OWNERSHIP: £905.99 * See more Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge deals here The best Samsung Galaxy S7 contract deals 
Below are the key S7 deals, where our highlight are Vodafone for its big data. 
SIM free 
Get the Samsung S7 (32GB) SIM free for £414.00 - saving over £126 
Vodafone 
This Galaxy S7 deal has 3GB of data for just £32.00 a month, with a no upfront fee. Galaxy S7 32GB 24GB of 4G UK data (two months unlimited) Unlimited minutes Unlimited texts 
TOTAL COST OF OWNERSHIP: £768.00 
Get the Galaxy S7 (32GB) on Vodafone for £32.00 a month in Black | White | Gold | Pink Gold 
O2 
O2's star 32GB Galaxy S7 deal gives you a decent amount data (3GB) , for £28.50 a month, with a £25.00 upfront fee. Galaxy S7 32GB 3GB of 4G UK data Unlimited minutes Unlimited texts 
TOTAL COST OF OWNERSHIP: £709.00 
Get the Galaxy S7 (32GB) on O2 for £28.50 a month, and an upfront cost of £25.00 in Black | Silver | White | Gold | Pink Gold 
Three 
Three's best 32GB S7 offer has a very low Total Cost of Ownership, with 8 GB of data for £29.00 a month. Galaxy S7 32GB 8GB of 4G UK data Unlimited minutes Unlimited texts 
TOTAL COST OF OWNERSHIP: £715.99 
Get the Galaxy S7 (32GB) on Three for £29.00 a month, plus £19.99 upfront in Black | White | Gold | Pink Gold 
EE 
EE's best deal for the 32GB Galaxy S7 gives you a whole host of data - 5GB - all for a monthly cost of £30.99. Free BT Sport for three months Free Apple Music for six months Samsung Galaxy S7 32GB 5GB of 4G UK data (double speed) Unlimited minutes Unlimited texts 
TOTAL COST OF OWNERSHIP: £743.76 
* See more Samsung Galaxy S7 deals here Liked that? Read this...
